      • getStateFromMemento

        public Cache getStateFromMemento(CacheManager cacheList)
        Returns the previous state from cache for undoing the last move.
        Parameters:
        cacheList - List where the previous state is saved (if it exists)
        Returns:
        Cache-element or null if there is no entry for the given gameBoardID

      • saveStateToMemento

        public void saveStateToMemento(PlayingPiece[][] state,
                               CacheManager cacheList)
        Saves a given state in a Cache list. This method is used for saving the current state into the CacheManager. If there already exists a previous state for the gameBoardID it will be overwritten otherwise the method will create a new list element and add it to the list.
        Parameters:
        state - PlayingPiece[]
        cacheList - CacheManager
